title.narrative: YOUTH EDUCATION ACTIVITIES ON SEXUAL AND REPRODUCTIVE HEALTH AND RIGHTS (YEASRH)

description.narrative: Youth Educational Activities on Sexual and Reproductive Health (YEASRH) aims to build a Rwanda where every pregnancy is wanted and every young person?s potential is fulfilled thus being at the centre of development. Firstly, the project will create a generation of youth with adequate Sexual and Reproductive Health (SRH) information and family planning (SRH&FP) skills to share through systematic educational sessions. This will be done through 12 interventional schools? clubs, 10 radio talks, 5 TV shows, and Kigali youth corners. The project will advocate for the presence of SRH information in adaptable language for people with speaking and hearing disabilities. Moreover, advocate for regular refilling of condom dispensers at University of Rwanda; Remera,Huye, Nyarugenge, Nyagatare, Rukara,Rusizi and Busogo campuses. Thirdly, the project will empower MEDSAR members into competent professional organizational managers and SRH advocates through systematic workshops considering the project's gender equality inclusion.
